main.name: Kingman Reed Douglass
main.description: Charismatic and versatile, currently developing a new skill-set in coding and excited for the future (but the one without robots that murder).
main.bio: From business owner to corporate sheep - who won awards and listened well - to an aspring software developer; the unknown doesnt scare me, it excites me.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to reach out with any questions you may have, thank you.

work.title: Regional Sales Manager
work.description: Awarded 2017 Rookie of the Year. Awarded 2017 Most Complete Quote Requests by the underwriting department. Held the most quote requests for a direct sales rep in 2017 & 2018.

work.description: Negotioted business buyout. Managed daily operations including marketing, account and production for numerous crews. Operated at a 60% profit margin. Increased revenue by an average of 15% yearly

testimonials.text: Kingman is a jovial presence that brings motivation to any team he works on. His preternatural ability to learn on the fly makes him an invaluable asset for any position

What started as a weird infatuation he had with me blossomed into something I didnâ€™t see coming. Kingman taught me that it is okay to love myself and that with a little confidence, there is nothing I cannot do.
